name: Incinerate
description:
Nasty peasant thief steals Pyro's egg from her nest. Help Pyro burn down the evil humans on her quest to save her precious egg. Can you survive this action-packed bullet hell and stop the humans from turning your egg into an omelette?

We made this game for our school's game project course. Enjoy :)

Credits:

  • Janessa Aulén    –    Programming, Art
  • Teemu Turku    –    Programming, Models
  • Joonas Vuorela    –    Programming, Models, Music/Sounds
